dashboard.name: Dashboard Overview
dashboard.description: Learn about your dashboard and navigation

onboarding-help-button.title: Onboarding Help
onboarding-help-button.content: You can restart the onboarding tutorial anytime by clicking this help button in the top bar. This will guide you through all the features of MediShift.

onboarding-intro.title: Welcome to Your Dashboard
onboarding-intro.content: This is your central hub. To get the most out of MediShift, let's start by completing your profile details.

expand-sidebar.title: Navigation Menu
expand-sidebar.content: This is the navigation menu. You can access all features of MediShift from here - your profile, messages, contracts, calendar, marketplace, and settings. If the menu is collapsed, click the expand button to see all options.

navigate-to-profile.title: Let's Get Started with Your Profile
navigate-to-profile.content: To begin, please click on the Profile tab. This is where you'll complete your personal and professional information. We'll guide you through each step once you're there.

profileTabs.name: Professional Profile Setup
profileTabs.description: Complete your professional profile step by step

personal-details-tab.title: Step 1: Personal Details
personal-details-tab.content: Start by filling out your personal information like name, address, and contact details. You can upload your CV using the Auto Fill button to speed up the process, or fill in the information manually.

professional-background-tab.title: Step 2: Professional Background
professional-background-tab.content: Next, add your qualifications, specialties, and work experience. You can use the Auto Fill button to speed up the process, or fill in the information manually. Complete this section to continue to the next step.

billing-information-tab.title: Step 3: Billing Information
billing-information-tab.content: Set up your payment details to get paid for your work quickly and securely. You can use the Auto Fill button to speed up the process, or fill in the information manually. Complete this section to continue.

document-uploads-tab.title: Step 4: Document Uploads
document-uploads-tab.content: Upload your professional documents such as certificates, resume, and recommendation letters.

full-access-unlocked.title: Full Access Unlocked!
full-access-unlocked.content: Congratulations! You've provided all required information. You now have full access to all platform features, including the marketplace and contract management.

account-tab.title: Step 5: Account Settings
account-tab.content: Review your account details. This is where you can manage your email and profile preferences.

settings-tab.title: Step 6: Preferences
settings-tab.content: Finally, configure your notification preferences and availability to ensure you get the right opportunities at the right time.

profile-completion-info.title: Profile Complete!
profile-completion-info.content: Congratulations! Your profile is now complete. You have access to all platform features. Let's continue to the next section.

facilityProfileTabs.name: Facility Profile Setup
facilityProfileTabs.description: Complete your facility profile step by step

facility-core-details-tab.title: Step 1: Facility Core Details
facility-core-details-tab.content: Start by filling out your facility information like name, type, address, and contact details. You can upload documents using the Auto Fill button to speed up the process, or fill in the information manually.

facility-legal-billing-tab.title: Step 2: Legal & Billing Information
facility-legal-billing-tab.content: Next, add your legal company details, billing information, and payment setup. You can use the Auto Fill button to speed up the process, or fill in the information manually. This is the final step!

facility-profile-completion-info.title: Profile Complete!
facility-profile-completion-info.content: Congratulations! Your facility profile is now complete. You have access to all platform features. Let's continue to the next section.

messages.name: Messaging
messages.description: Learn how to use the messaging feature

messages-overview.title: Messaging Feature
messages-overview.content: The messaging feature allows you to communicate with employers and other professionals.

messages-conversations.title: Your Conversations
messages-conversations.content: Here you can see all your active conversations. Click on any conversation to view and respond to messages.

messages-compose.title: Start New Conversation
messages-compose.content: Start a new conversation by clicking on the "New Message" button.

contentByRole.professional: You can start a conversation with the members of your team by clicking on New message, or contact any employer for your current contracts.
contentByRole.facility: You can start a conversation with your team members or contact professionals you are working with by clicking on New message.

contracts.name: Contracts
contracts.description: Learn how to manage your contracts

contracts-overview.title: Contracts Feature
contracts-overview.content: The contracts feature allows you to manage all your employment contracts in one place.

contracts-list.title: Your Contracts
contracts-list.content: Here you can see all your active and past contracts. Click on any contract to view its details.

calendar.name: Calendar
calendar.description: Learn how to manage your schedule

calendar-overview.title: Calendar Feature
calendar-overview.content: The calendar feature helps you manage your schedule and appointments.

calendar-view.title: Calendar View
calendar-view.content: View your schedule in different formats - daily, weekly, or monthly.

calendar-appointment.title: Creating Appointments
calendar-appointment.content: Create new appointments by clicking on a time slot or using the "New Appointment" button.

marketplace.name: Marketplace
marketplace.description: Learn how to find job opportunities

marketplace-overview.title: Marketplace Feature
marketplace-overview.content: The marketplace allows you to discover job opportunities and connect with employers.

marketplace-search.title: Searching Opportunities
marketplace-search.content: Search and filter job opportunities based on your preferences.

marketplace-apply.title: Applying for Jobs
marketplace-apply.content: Apply for job opportunities with a single click or save them for later.

payroll-overview.title: Payroll Feature
payroll-overview.content: The payroll feature allows you to manage payroll requests and track payment processing for your facility.

payroll-requests.title: Payroll Requests
payroll-requests.content: View and manage all payroll requests. You can see the status of each request and track payments.

payroll-status.title: Tracking Payroll Status
payroll-status.content: Monitor the status of payroll requests from draft to completed. Filter by status to find specific requests.

organization.name: Organization
organization.description: Learn how to manage your organization

organization-overview.title: Organization Feature
organization-overview.content: The organization feature allows you to manage pharmacy chains or groups, including multiple facilities under one organization.

organization-facilities.title: Managing Facilities
organization-facilities.content: View and manage all facilities that are part of your organization. You can add or remove facilities from the group.

organization-settings.title: Organization Settings
organization-settings.content: Configure organization-wide settings and manage administrators who have access to all facilities in the chain.

settings.name: Settings
settings.description: Learn how to customize your account

settings-overview.title: Settings Feature
settings-overview.content: The settings section allows you to customize your account preferences.

settings-account.title: Account Settings
settings-account.content: Update your account information, change your password, and manage email preferences.

settings-notifications.title: Notification Settings
settings-notifications.content: Customize your notification preferences to control what alerts you receive.

profile-overview.title: Your Profile
profile-overview.content: Your profile contains all your personal and professional information.

profile-edit.title: Editing Your Profile
profile-edit.content: You can update your profile information at any time through the different sections.

full.title: Full Access
full.description: Complete all profile tabs to unlock all platform features

team.title: Team Access
team.description: Quick access to team features without completing full profile
